homePage.subtitle: I'm Monica
homePage.description: I'm a front-end web developer! I have experience with JavaScript, mainly with React and NextJS. I have a background in Psychology and have also worked teaching English to children and toddlers, but software development has won me over.

result.0: Thank you for reaching out to me!

project0.description: A website created to consume data from an third-party API and display it on screen.

project1.description: A full stack application to rank the animes you've watched! Axios was used to fetch the user's data from our database and also to fetch animes from a third-party api, that serves the anime guide.

project2.description: A music player, developed with nothing but vanilla Javascript, CSS and HTML.

notFound: How did you get here? Would you like some music?
